Question: Which food is the little girl's favorite?

Reference Answer: pizza

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/405444.jpg

Original program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='little girl')
IMAGE0=CROP(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE0,question='Which food is the little girl's favorite?')
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="Which food is the little girl's favorite?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Which food is the little girl's favorite?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>pizza</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>pizza</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: pizza
